subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jimbo Fisher, the offensive coordinator at Louisiana State, took the same job at Florida State on Monday. Fisher spent the past seven seasons at L.S.U., where the offense set 13 team records under his direction.
snippet: Jimbo Fisher, the offensive coordinator at Louisiana State, took the same job at Florida State on Monday. Fisher spent the past seven seasons at L.S.U., where the offense set 13 team records under his direction.
